author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bovie Medical Corp Q1 Loss Per Share $0.03
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Bovie Medical Corp:
* ORATION REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS; REAFFIRMS FISCAL YEAR 2018 FINANCIAL OUTLOOK
* Q1 REVENUE $9.9 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $9.3 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.02 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $41 MILLION TO $42.5 MILLION * REAFFIRMS FISCAL YEAR 2018 FINANCIAL OUTLOOK Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
